TopicTitle: So the new things added to KSP

Articles.Content:
For one Awesome, because now its a tiny bit easyer to gain an orbit that isnt the sun. Just literaly got my first -i think- stable orbit of Kearth, just wondering how hard is it to actually do this? haha.

Gots some pictures added if anyone wants to look, im quite proud of myself.
ummm... You\'re about a month too late.
